identified-content.person: BROWN, SOPHIE STEPHANIE PEZON (SOPHIE STEPHANIE PEZON HAWKINS)

block.p: Sophie Stephanie Pezon Brown, a daughter of Mr. and Mrs. William Gardner Brown of Lake Forest, Ill., was married on Thursday to Val Parham Hawkins Jr., a son of Mr. and Mrs. Hawkins Sr. of Alexandria, Va. Guy Lebleu, a deputy mayor of Amboise, France, officiated at the town hall there. Yesterday, the couple had a Roman Catholic ceremony at the Church of St. Denis in Amboise.
The couple graduated from Princeton University.

Sophie Stephanie Pezon Brown, a daughter of Mr. and Mrs. William Gardner Brown of Lake Forest, Ill., was married on Thursday to Val Parham Hawkins Jr., a son of Mr. and Mrs. Hawkins Sr. of Alexandria, Va. Guy Lebleu, a deputy mayor of Amboise, France, officiated at the town hall there. Yesterday, the couple had a Roman Catholic ceremony at the Church of St. Denis in Amboise.
The couple graduated from Princeton University.
Mrs. Hawkins teaches mathematics and English at a Sylvan Learning Center in New York. Her father is a partner in Bell, Boyd & Lloyd, a Chicago law firm.

Mr. Hawkins is an analyst at Thomas Weisel Partners, a New York investment bank. His mother, Florence Fox Hawkins, is an interior designer in Alexandria. His father is the managing director of the USAA Realty Company in Arlington, Va.
